title: Will PES University start online classes or offline? - Quora

response.answer_text: PES University will start the classes online in the last week of November/first week of December for the first year of 2020–21 via Microsoft Teams. You will be given the credentials maybe like few days before classes start. Most probably classes this year will be online itself but you need to attend internals and final sem exam offline (on campus). The reason for offline tests is for easy logistics compared to online exams and the management feels that there can be a lot of malpractices during online tests and the best way to judge a student's capability is by an offline test. All the best!!!

PES University will be conducting their classes both in the online and offline mode. Students can opt either of the modes depending on their convience. Exams and practicals/lab sessions will be held strictly in offline mode and the student must come to the campus for exams. A student's guardian/parent must give their consent in written for their ward to attend the classes in offline mode.
